I have beaten this game and it was a trip. Honestly the most fun I had was when I was angry. Just feeling that sense of destruction was powerful. It felt so good to smah a vase with a fish or break things with a chair. I seriously recommend this to everyone! If your thinking about buying it just go for it! You won't be disappointed!

Edit: I'm experincing 2 nasty bugs with the weapon challenges, 1 is suck n chuck and the other is the tomahawk challenge i belive its called target practice, where no matter how hard I try it simply won't work. If you can please fix this in a later patch. Thank you.

I have tried to instal the game multiple times but after it is almost done it says it cant be installed i tried this prosses over and over even going into the oculos site but it wont work plzz respond to this review when you found a solution
review_feedback: We haven't had this issue logged from anyone before, assuming you're using the Oculus desktop app, could it be your install location, is there enough disk space? Could you contact support@hotelrnr.wolfandwood.co with more information?

one_reviews_text: The game is extremely fun. On tho outside it looks like it doesn't have very much content but trust me it has a lot to offer.

Very fun, unique, and creative game with charming graphics, lots of gameplay, and rewarding progression. Theres a good deal of strategy in the game, so that you can optimize the mayhem that you cause. The game also has a very cool soundtrack. Overall a great experience!

i have reset my progress a few times not but i will open the game have nothing and once im done playing the first hotel all of a sudden everything is fully unlocked and upgraded. odd glitch but it just let me enjoy everything the game had
review_feedback: We put a patch out on Monday (1st June) evening, that, if you clear your progress via the Settings menu - should resolve the issue.  - support@hotelrnr.wolfandwood.co

review_title: Extremely fun And i have a recomendation
one_reviews_text:
if you are intererested in the trailer like me than trust me you will love smashing the hotels to bits.  The physics are really good and you can even punch the maid! 
Honestly you really cant go wrong with buying this trust me. 

Hey just wanted to say all the problems where fixed! I really love this game and played each level dozens of times, the one thing that i think would make the game even better is this. Now when i smash up the rooms i dont get to much time before the hotel staff get in the way, this is fun in its own way but it would be really cool if there was a mode like this. The mode could be called anything "freemode"  something like that, basicly in the mode there would be no staff or time limit just so you can mess around and take your time I think this would be amazing.
review_feedback: (Updated) Thanks for the update, happy to hear you're all running as expected! Also we added a sandbox mode in the latest update so you can go wild without any interruption from the hotel staff! support@hotelrnr.wolfandwood.co

one_reviews_text:
now if the trailor interest you, which it did me obviously, i think you cant go wrong buying this. smashing the hotels were actually fun, compared to my lower expectations. it definately does alot right and makes a fun gameplay loop.
this in turn makes you want to earn more money and get better items. well the pawn shop has them, and they are mostly fun and interesting weapons. some are powerups of sorts.
fun game, and i definately enjoyed smashing everything in sight. 
there is a few gated areas with signs saying content is coming, so i really hope it does come. more ways to destroy, more mechanics, more weapons, all of those additions would be great to me. also the hotels get bigger and cooler each one, and you have to avoid hotel staff or your arrested. great game and cant wait to see more content. also more story like the start would be cool.

So at first i really wanted to test this game. and sometimes games aren't really realistic but this game makes it realistic, like when i punch a walll or anything i will get hurt then my fingers break. This is a fun good game with lots of things you can do I love this so much.

this game helps me relieve anger and have fun at the same time, i like the way you can unlock new hotels and get new items to, the trailor looked cool and the youtube videos i found on it made it look even cooler, the main reason this has 5 stars is the fact that i can yeet a toaster without causing damage in real life, but i wish you could make toast with the toaster

1st Impressions Video with Commentary:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D2jSUgYba5U
(Please Note: Links might not work from Oculus so please search YouTube for 'Paradise Decay VR Hotel RnR')

My Initial Thoughts:
Ok, wow! I was not expecting this level of creativity, polish and enjoyment. There's lots to do here as you unlock items and create chaos.
In Hotel RnR you sign a contract with the devil to cause as much mayhem and destruction in hotel rooms as you go on tour. Your tasked with avoiding the staff in the hotels and causing enough damage in order to buy more fun toys, weapons. The game also offers some really cool mini-games.
Superb!

it was fun but they made some things literallyt impossible that should be easy. One infamy chjallenge is to throw the TV in the pool. Seems simple right? No the character can barely even pick it up. fix your game
review_feedback: (Updated) Hey, we added invisible handles to grab the TV and Kegs. We also made it easier to do damage early game along with a ton of other quality of life changes in the new version.
